org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model

Class PackageGenerationPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.model.PackageGenerationPreferences

  • public class PackageGenerationPreferences
extends Object

    PackageGenerationPreferences describes package generation parameters. The PackageGenerationPreferences object is used to inform users of the parameters involved in creating a package, as well as elicit user's input for the values of these parameters.

    A PackageGenerationPreferences object is capable of containing both general package generation preferences and format-specific package generation preferences. These sets of preferences have to be populated separately, with the general preferences being populated first. References to format-specific preferences files are included in the general preferences and have to be resolved after general preferences are loaded.

    Null preferences and preferences with empty or null names cannot be added to PackageGenerationPreferences,
